dashboard.introduction: The information on this screen comes from data in the 121 Platform only.
dashboard.help-explanation: You can get a description of each label or header by clicking/focusing/hovering on these elements:

program-team.page-description: In this page you can create a team for your program

popup.roles-required: Please select at least one role

remove.title: Remove team member
remove.introduction: Removing the team member will result in them not having any access to program or its data.
remove.explanation: Removing team member does not mean deleting their account from the 121 portal. If you wish to delete their account, please contact the admin.
remove.confirmation-question: Are you sure to remove this user from the program team?
remove.succes-message: You’ve successfully removed a team member

add.title: Add team member
add.succes-message: You’ve successfully added a team member
add.already-member: This user is already a team member

change.title: Edit team member roles
change.succes-message: You’ve successfully edited the role(s) of this user

error-messages.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address.
error-messages.401: This combination of email address and password is unknown.

registrationValidation.label: Registration & validation
registrationValidation.actionText-enabled-registrations: Registrations are now enabled for this program
registrationValidation.actionText-disabled-registrations: Registrations are now disabled for this program

state-explanation.imported: PAs that were imported, based on phone-number.
state-explanation.startedRegistration: PAs that started registration in the PA-app.
state-explanation.registered: PAs that finished registration in the PA-app.
state-explanation.selectedForValidation: PAs that were selected for validation.
state-explanation.included:
PAs that were included.
They will receive payments starting with the next payment/payout round.
state-explanation.inclusionEnded:
PAs for which inclusion was ended.
They will not receive any (more) payments for the next payment/payout round.
state-explanation.noLongerEligible:
PAs that were marked as 'no longer eligible'.
These are PAs who were invited but did not yet register and are meanwhile no longer eligible.
state-explanation.rejected:
PAs that were rejected.
They will not receive any (more) payments for the next payment/payout round.
state-explanation.deleted:
PAs that were deleted.
This can include e.g. deleted PAs after an incorrect import, as well as PAs who have received payments, are no longer included, and are subsequently deleted after some time.

payment.label: Payment #:
payment.explanation:
All PA that reached a certain status - e.g. included - at any moment in between the previous payment and the chosen payment.

This is not the number of included PA at the moment of that payment, but the number of PA that were included in between the previous payment and the chosen payment.

Note that the PA included in this time period may not necessarily be the same PA as those that registered in this time period, as they may have registered e.g. in the previous time period.

payment-from-start.label: Up to selected payment #:
payment-from-start.explanation: This row shows all data up to and including the selected payment, instead of only the data specific to this payment period (the period between the previous payment and the selected payment).

calendar-month.label: Calendar month:
calendar-month.explanation:
All PA that reached a certain status - e.g. included - at any moment in the chosen month.

This is not the number of included PA at the end of that month, but the number of PA that were included at any moment in that month.

Note that the PA included in this month may not necessarily be the same PA as those that registered in this month, as they may have registered e.g. in the previous month.

month-from-start.label: Up to selected month:
month-from-start.explanation: This row shows all data up to and including this month, instead of only the data specific to this month.

to-date.label: To date:
to-date.explanation:
All PA that reached a certain status - e.g. included - at any moment between the start of the program and now.

This is not the number of included PA at the moment, but the number of all PA that were included at some point.

totals.total-helped-to-date: Total number of individual PA helped to date
totals.tooltip: PAs that received one or more payments

over-time.tooltip:
This chart shows the number of People Affected that were successfully paid out per payment.

This number is split by 'pre-existing' and 'new' PAs, based on whether the PA was also present in the previous payment or not.

'Successfully paid out' means that the payment (e.g. voucher) was successfully issued and the PA is informed about it, but does not imply the payment is collected and/or spent.

program-payout.total-amount: Maximum amount that will be spend this payment: {{totalCost}}

result.api:
Successfully sent payment request for {{nrPa}} PA(s).

The payments can take some time to process. Inspect the PA-table below for the up-to-date status of the payment(s).

You can close this popup.
result.csv:
Successfully prepared payment data for {{nrPa}} PA(s).

Next, please:
  1. Select the payment in the Choose payment... dropdown
  2. Use the Export payment instructions button
  3. Save the resulting XLSX-file in the format required by the Financial Service Provider
  4. Upload the file in the portal of the Financial Service Provider.
result.xml:
Successfully prepared payment data for {{nrPa}} PA(s).

Next, please:
  1. Select the payment in the Choose payment... dropdown
  2. Use the Export payment instructions button
  3. Save the resulting XML-file
  4. Upload the file in the portal of the Financial Service Provider.

last-payment.confirm-prompt: This will retry ONLY the {{number}} failed payment(s).

cbe.message:
The data in this report is based on data that is imported every night from CBE.
If you changed data today this will not be reflected in the report.

error.generic: Something went wrong with the payment. Please contact 121 technical support.

program-people-affected.filter-tooltip: Show all People Affected or only the People Affected relevant to this program phase

filter-btn.empty-selection-alert-message: Please select at least one option
filter-btn.multiple-choice-hidden-options: Above list only shows a status if assigned to at least one Person Affected

action-inputs.message-checkbox: Send a message to these People Affected
action-inputs.delete-warning: You are about to delete the personal information of these People Affected. This action cannot be undone. You cannot see past payments of them anymore and cannot make new payments to them.
action-inputs.message-explanation: There is no templated message available for this action. Please provide the message that will be sent. Note that if you go over 160 characters the Person affected may receive the message as multiple texts, if they have a feature (non smart) phone.
action-inputs.templated-explanation: The following message will be sent to PAs in their own language.
action-inputs.templated-support: Please contact the 121 support team if you want to change this templated message.
action-inputs.placeholder-pa-data: Please make sure that all People Affected data is filled for the placeholders used.

reject.explanation: Please ensure to give a reason, and if possible, what their next steps could be.

program-people-affected.no-checkboxes: There are currently no People Affected to which this action can be applied.

transaction.waiting-message: Still waiting for status update on this transaction. Refresh the page for the latest status.
transaction.nosupport: No FSP supported for this transfer

paymentAmountMultiplier.label: Transfer value multiplier
paymentAmountMultiplier.explanation: The transfer value will be multiplied by this number for this Person Affected

phoneNumber.label: Phone number
phoneNumber.explanation: The required format is: ONLY numbers, including country-code.

whatsappPhoneNumber.label: WhatsApp number
whatsappPhoneNumber.explanation: The required format is: ONLY numbers, including country-code.

maxPayments.explanation: The maximum number of payments for this Person Affected. You can remove the limit by removing the value and saving.

error.too-low: Input should be higher than the number of payments that have already been sent

edit-person-affected-popup.fspChangeWarning: Selecting this FSP will delete the following attributes related to the old FSP:
edit-person-affected-popup.fspNewAttributesExplanation: For this FSP the following attributes are required:

note.introduction: You can add, edit or remove notes about this particular Person Affected in the field below. Please keep Personal Identifiable Information (PII) to a minimum and delete any PII when no longer needed.
note.placeholder: Start a note about this Person Affected by typing here...

error-alert.invalid-date: The date format you inputted is not valid. A valid date format example is 31-12-1970 which follows day-month-year, DD-MM-YYYY

reason-popup.explanation: Please provide a reason why this change was made.
reason-popup.max-length: Do not use more than {{maxLength}} characters.
reason-popup.unsaved-changes-explanation: Your changes have not been saved.

payment-status-popup.fix-error: Please take the necessary action to fix this error. Then use the button below to retry payment for this Person Affected.

bulk-action-response.response:
Successfully sent request to {{action}} for {{paNumber}} People Affected.

The operation can take some time to process. Inspect the PA-table below for the up-to-date status.
bulk-action-response.pa-moved-phase: People Affected might be visible in another phase after this status change.

bulk-action-conditions.invite: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Imported or No longer eligible.
bulk-action-conditions.selectForValidation: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Registered.
bulk-action-conditions.include: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Registered, Selected for Validation, Validated, Rejected, Inclusion Ended, Paused, or Completed.
bulk-action-conditions.endInclusion: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Included or Completed.
bulk-action-conditions.reject: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Registered, Selected for Validation, Validated, Included, No Longer Eligible, or Registered While No Longer Eligible.
bulk-action-conditions.markNoLongerEligible: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Imported or Invited.
bulk-action-conditions.pause: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations with the status Included.
bulk-action-conditions.deletePa: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations that are not already deleted.
bulk-action-conditions.sendMessage: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations that have a phone number associated with them.
bulk-action-conditions.doPayment: Note: The {{action}} action is only applicable to registrations that have not yet received the payment.

table-filter-row.select-column-to-filter: Type or select column to filter

bulk-import.import-error:
Something went wrong with the import.
  • Check the required extension (.csv)
  • Check the format and column-names of the CSV-file
  • Error message:{{specific}}

import-result.csv: A CSV is automatically downloaded, which shows the import-status and the registration-status per row.
import-result.existing: There were {{countExistingPhoneNr}} existing phone-numbers, which are skipped.
import-result.invalid: There were {{countInvalidPhoneNr}} unrecognizable phone numbers. Try to correct them and import again.

bulk-import.timestamp: Latest import has been done on: {{dateTime}}

imported.explanation: Make sure to match the required format of the template CSV-file. The import takes about 1 minute per 100 records
imported.confirm-message: The system will detect only new phone-numbers and import them as People Affected.

registered.explanation: Make sure to match the required format of the template CSV-file. The import takes about 1 minute per 100 records
registered.confirm-message: The system will create 'registered' People Affected.

export-list.timestamp: Latest export has been done on: {{dateTime}}
export-list.no-data: There is currently no data to download

all-people-affected.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file with all People Affected.

included.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file with all included People Affected.

selected-for-validation.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file with all People Affected selected for validation, to be used for Validation visits.

payment.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file with all People Affected included in this payment.

unused-vouchers.confirm-message:
This will download an Excel file with all unused voucher(s).

Important Notice: The unused vouchers available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each voucher's last external update.

duplicates.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file with all People Affected that are duplicate.
duplicates.canTakeFewMinutes: This can take up to a few minutes.

card-balances.confirm-message:
This will download an Excel file showing the balance of every card.

Important Notice: The card balances available for download are not in real-time. The report includes the date and time of each card's last external update.

pa-data-changes.confirm-message: This will download an Excel file showing all data changes for all people affectd of this program.

confirm-prompt.choose-dates: Optionally pass a Start date and/or an End date to filter the data changes.
confirm-prompt.wrong-dates: The end date must be greater than the start date

export-fsp-intructions.confirm-message: This will download a file with payment instructions for the Financial Service Provider.

sub-message.reconciliation: This export will only include People Affected for which the current transaction status is waiting.
sub-message.no-reconciliation: You should only use this file once per payment in the portal of the Financial Service Provider.

export-fsp-intructions.timestamp: Latest export has been done on: {{dateTime}}

import-fsp-reconciliation.explanation: Make sure to upload the reconciliation data exactly as provided by the Financial Service Provider.
import-fsp-reconciliation.timestamp: Latest import has been done on: {{dateTime}}

import-result.new:
Payment data updated for {{countTotal}} people affected:
  • {{countPaymentSuccess}} payments are successful
  • {{countPaymentFailed}} payments are failed
import-result.mismatch: BE CAREFUL: {{countPaymentStarted}} payments were started for payment #{{payment}}. Reconciliation data contains {{countImported}} payments. So, the total amount in the reconciliation data does not match with started payments. Note that all payments that do not have a success record in the reconciliation data are considered failed payments.
import-result.not-found: There were {{countNotFound}} transactions for which no matching Person Affected was found. Try to correct them and upload again.

manage-aidworkers.create-password: Enter a password of at least {{minimalLength}} characters:
manage-aidworkers.succes-create: Succesfully created user with email: '{{email}}' and password '{{password}}'. Please inform them now of their new account by sending an e-mail.

users.page-description: In this page you can add and manage users, and see roles and permissions.
users.title: USERS PAGE

notification-messages.password-requirements: Password must have at least {{minLength}} charachters, one capital letter, one lowercase letter and one number.

recipient.no-recipients-found: No information linked to this person's phone number was found in any active programs in the 121 Platform.
recipient.no-phone-number: When you receive a task, any information linked to the person's phone number found in active programs in the 121 Platform will appear here.
recipient.single-recipient-found: Found 1 Person Affected registered with this number
recipient.multiple-recipients-found: Found {{paCount}} People Affected registered with this number

common.confirm-message-label: The message needs to be longer than {{minLength}} character(s).
common.export-error: Something went wrong with the export.
common.import-error: Something went wrong with the import.
common.unknown-error: Something went wrong. Error is unknown.
common.try-again-contact-support: Please try again. If the problem persists, contact technical support.
common.answer-is-required: An answer is required for this question.

confirm-prompt.prefix: Are you sure you want to
confirm-prompt.new-card: permanently block this card and issue a new card?
confirm-prompt.suffix: This will automatically send a message to the person affected.

add-note-popup.add-note-profile: You are about to add a note to {{ name }}'s profile.
add-note-popup.note-visible: The note will be visible to other 121 users who are permitted to view personal profiles.
add-note-popup.note-textarea-placeholder: Click here to type a short note

system-notifications.compatible-browsers: The 121 Portal works best in Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Microsoft Edge. The 121 Portal does not work in Internet Explorer.
